WaitWhile is an appointment scheduling a: 等候是一个预约安排和队列管理平台。
\nTo get your Waitwhile API Key:\n\n1. G:
To get your Waitwhile API Key:

1. Go to the [Integrations Settings](https://v2.waitwhile.com/account/integrations) page in your Waitwhile account
2. Create a new API Key (or use an existing one)
3. Copy the API Key and paste it here
Create a new customer in Waitwhile: 在等候时间创建新客户
Create a new visit or update an existing: 创建新访客或更新现有访客。
Permanently remove a visit from the data: 从数据库中永久删除访问。访问将无法检索，不会被计入分析中。
Search for customers by name, phone, ema: 通过名称、电话、电子邮件或标识符搜索客户
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Start date/time in ISO format (e.g., 202: 开始日期/时间，以ISO 格式(例如，2024-01-01T10:00:00Z)
Search query for name, phone, email, or: 搜索名称、电话、电子邮件或客户标识符的查询 (前缀匹配)
Filter by tag associated with visit: 按与访问关联的标签过滤
Max number of results (1-100, defaults t: 结果的最大数量 (1-100, 默认为20)
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when an SMS or EMAIL notificati: 当短信或电子邮件通知创建或其交付状态改变时触发
Triggers when a visit is created or upda: 创建或更新访问时触发
